actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to require that all Federal retirement or annuity payments be disregarded in determining annual income under the veterans' pension laws.

summary.text: Requires that all Federal, and ten percent of all non-Federal public or private, retirement or annuity payments be disregarded in determining annual income under the veterans' pension laws.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to require that all Federal retirement or annuity payments be disregarded in determining annual income under the veterans' pension laws.
